snippet.title: The Lost Records (DLC) - Announcement Trailer - The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
snippet.description:
🔥 Free Download: https://gamebanana.com/mods/149537
❤️ Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/waikuteru
🍌 Gamebanana account: https://gamebanana.com/members/1676542

IMPORTANT NOTES FOR NINTENDO:
This mod will only grant the players amiibo items IF THE THEY OWN THEM. I integrated an ingame-check with the EventSystemActor query "HasPorchItem" and set a custom flag IF THEY HAVE one of the amiibo items in their pouch they would be granted in this mod. This way it's NO PIRACY. Gamebanana (famous modding site) approved that's also within their ToS.

The Lost Records is a downloadable mod that includes:
- Custom Boss (2 Phases)
- Custom Dungeon
- Custom Camera
- Custom Objects
- Custom Events
- Custom Music
- Challenging Battles
- New Puzzles
- Fi Integration
- More

This mod comes with an ingame setup to ensure best gameplay for you.

Platform: Cemu

Music: Ballad of the Goddess
Composers: Hajime Wakai, Takeshi Hama

#Zelda #BreathOfTheWild #DLC
